iati-activity.title: The Active Learning Centre:Building democratic dialogue with women in communities
iati-activity.description: This project will empower women in communities to participate in purposeful dialogue with their female MPs. It will achieve this aim by working with 7,500 women who are experiencing deprivation to encourage them to voice their concerns on a range of topics. This will be done by holding over 200 interactive meetings across Malawi with women MPs. The MPs will then work together using the results of these meetings to lobby for the amendment of laws, policy and services. The skills to map, explore, listen and record the views of constituents will be developed in project workshops, including the skills to carry the dialogue forward and influence public debate, legislation and policy, strengthening the women's caucus in the process. The Active Learning Centre will partner with experts in Malawi to develop and deliver the skills by developing educational material and workshops.
